Right, I meant the specific problem. It's never possible to guarantee that you've solved _all_ bugs. If only...

Nice catch!
Thanks for fixing.
Post merge ACK.
Where does this value come from? If from berkeleydb itself: Is it documented, or available as some kind of constant?\n
We could probably make it a constant for our sakes anyway.\n
